 # Flow 3 
# 1. Signup user 3
mutation create_user_3 {
  createUser(
    user: {
      username: "user3"
      password: "user3"
      first_name: "user"
      last_name: "3",
      date_of_birth: "2002-02-02",
    }
  ) {
    user_id
    username
    first_name
    last_name
    date_of_birth
    bio
    profile_picture
  }
}

# 2. Login user 3 
mutation login_user_3 {
  login(username: "user3", password: "user3") {
    token
  }
}

# 3. Attempt follow user 2 as user 1 (unauthorized)
mutation follow_user_2_as_1 {
  createUserInteraction(userInteraction: {
    user_id_initiator: 1,
    user_id_recipient: 2,
    interaction_type: FOLLOW 
  }) {
    user_interaction_id
    interaction_type
    user_id_initiator
    user_id_recipient
    timestamp
  }
}

# 4. Upload profile picture for user 2 (unauthorized)
mutation profile_picture {
  uploadProfilePicture(userImage: {
    user_id: 2,
    profile_picture_blob: "data:image/png;base64,"
  }){
    user_id 
    profile_picture_path
  }
}

# 5. Create post for user 2 (unauthorized)
mutation create_post {
  createPost(post: {
    user_id: 2,
    text: "I just hacked this guy's account"
  }) {
    post_id
    user_id
    parent_post_id
    text
    timestamp
    no_likes
    no_bookmarks
    no_reposts
  }
}

# 6. Repost user 1's post
mutation repost {
  createPostInteraction(postInteraction: { 
    user_id: 3,
    post_id: 1,
    interaction_type: REPOST
  }) {
    post_interaction_id
    post_id
    user_id
    interaction_type
    timestamp
  }
}

# 7. Get trending posts
query trending {
  trendingPosts {
    post_id
    user_id
    parent_post_id
    text
    timestamp
    no_likes
    no_bookmarks
    no_reposts
  }
}
